name: ZenswapContributeTest

attributes.documentation:
Fallback function
     * The function without name is the default function that is called whenever anyone sends funds to a contract
Withdraw an "amount" of available tokens in this contract
attributes.name: withdrawAvailableToken

attributes.documentation: Set the amount of tokens per one ether
attributes.name: setTokensPerEth

attributes.documentation: Set a token contract address and available tokens
attributes.name: setTokenReward

attributes.documentation: Set available tokens to synchronized or force halt contribution campaign
attributes.name: setAvailableToken
